mapper.select: SELECT u.userNum, u.id, u.nickname, u.createdAt, ui.content2, ui.profile FROM users u, userInfo ui WHERE u.userNum = ui.userNum AND id = #{id}

SELECT uf.userId, u.userNum, u.nickname, to_char(u.createdAt,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS createdAt, ui.content2, ui.profile FROM userFollow uf, users u, userInfo ui WHERE uf.followId = #{userId} and u.id = uf.userId and u.userNum = ui.userNum

SELECT uf.followId, u.userNum, u.nickname, to_char(u.createdAt,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS createdAt, ui.content2, ui.profile FROM userFollow uf, users u, userInfo ui WHERE uf.userId = #{userId} and u.id = uf.followId and u.userNum = ui.userNum

select a.followingCnt, b.followerCnt from ( select count(*) followingCnt from userFollow uf where uf.followid = #{userId} ) a, ( select count(*) followerCnt from userFollow uf where uf.userId = #{userId}) b
